title: Solar Farm Preventive Maintenance Scheduling
description: An operations planner needs to schedule the annual preventive maintenance for a portfolio of solar farms, minimizing production loss.

tasks.description: Identify all assets due for annual maintenance in the next quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a list of 5 solar farms requiring maintenance.

tasks.description: For each farm, analyze historical generation data and forward price forecasts to identify the lowest-revenue weeks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies optimal maintenance windows for each asset.

tasks.description: Check the availability of maintenance crews for the identified optimal windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent aligns asset downtime with crew availability.

tasks.description: Generate a final maintenance schedule and create the corresponding work orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a schedule and dispatches work orders to the maintenance team.
